busy.company

Interface CompanyService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompanyServiceImpl

    public interface CompanyService
    Company service logic interface. Connects the UI Application layer with the Persistence one, according to the business's processes and workflows.
    Author:
    malkomich
